professional_summary: Experienced SQL Database Administrator with over 4 years of expertise in database management, backup strategies, disaster recovery, and performance optimization.

key_responsibilities: Monitored databases for performance and tuning.
Developed and implemented backup and disaster recovery procedures.
Assessed new technologies' impact on database consistency and reliability.
Scheduled Full/Differential and Transactional log backups using Maintenance Plan Wizard and T-SQL.

Database Mirroring, Log Shipping, and Replication Configurations",

            "Monitoring Cluster (Active/Active and Active/Passive)",
            "T-SQL, Database Design Techniques, Partitioning Strategy",
            "SSRS and SSIS (ETL) Packages, Import - Export, Data Migration",
